content:
/>
XIV.2.B.1.b
.
Automatic Establishment of EP 130 and 600
An end product (EP) 130 or 600 is automatically established when a Social Security number (SSN) and date of death are generated for cases identified by the DMF match with one of the contentions described in the table below.
Contention
Match Results
SSA Death C&P Matched,
or
Dep Death C&P Match
The corporate record and the SSA DMF match on
SSN
date of birth (DOB), and
name.
SSA Death DOB Mismatch
,
or
Dep Death DOB Mismatch
Corporate record DOB does not match the SSA DOB.
SSA Death Name Mismatched
, or
Dep Name Mismatch
Corporate record last name or first initial of the first name do not match the SSA last name and/or first initial of the first name.
SSA Death Both Mismatch
, or
Dep Death Both Mismatch
Corporate record
last name or first initial of the first name do not match the SSA last name and/or first initial of the first name, and
DOB does not match the SSA DOB.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 2, Section B - Social Security Death Master File (DMF) Match
